Project Name
Development of New CRM System
Project Manager
Alex Johnson

:

 Emma Brown

 David Wilson

:
 Olivia Davis
Training Coordinator:
 Sophia Martinez
Support Specialist
:
 Liam Anderson
Objective
To develop and implement a new CRM system that enhances customer relationship management, improves sales tracking, and integrates with existing systems.
Success Criteria
Successful deployment of CRM system
Positive user feedback
Integration with existing systems without major issues
Achievement of performance and functionality requirements
Start date
August 1, 2024
Due date
January 31, 2025
Key outcomes
Requirements Specification Document
CRM System Design Document
Developed CRM System
Integration with Existing Systems
Testing and QA Reports
User Training Materials
Deployment and Go-Live Plan
Status
not started
Red
 Problem Statement
Tech Innovators Inc. has experienced significant growth in recent years, leading to an increased volume of customer interactions and sales activities. However, the company’s existing Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system has become inadequate in meeting the evolving needs of the organization. The current system is outdated, lacks integration with other critical business systems, and does not provide the advanced features necessary to manage customer relationships effectively.
To address these challenges, Tech Innovators Inc. aims to develop and implement a new CRM system that:
Enhances customer relationship management through advanced features and functionality.
Integrates seamlessly with existing business systems to provide a unified view of customer data.
Improves user experience with a modern, intuitive interface.
Provides robust data management and analytics capabilities to support data-driven decision-making.
Scales effectively to accommodate future growth and evolving business needs.
 Scope
Scope of the Project
Must have:
Requirements gathering and analysis
Design and development of the CRM system
Integration with existing systems (e.g., ERP, email)
Testing and quality assurance
User training and documentation
Deployment and go-live
Not in scope:
Development of custom modules beyond initial requirements
Major hardware upgrades
 Timeline
This is the Project Schedule.
true
